column4: System Spec: Ubuntu 8.04 AMD 64. Ati 1100 radeon..  I think i have a problem.. When i first installed ubuntu 8.04 my computer booted ok and the boot graphics workedand everything then ubuntu gave me a message saying updates were available. So i upgrade, reboot and so my surprise i have no graphics! I have to wait untill ubuntu starts up inorder to see anything and even then its only when its time to login.
